Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Maurice:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/: n~te piaylovoroc m~marturoc: Abba Mour/c n~te Tiba: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of the struggle-bearer and martyr, Saint Maurice the Theban, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
